org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Class AeAbstractProcessManager

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeManagerAdapter
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeAbstractProcessManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeManager, IAeProcessManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeInMemoryProcessManager, AePersistentProcessManager
public abstract class AeAbstractProcessManager
extends AeManagerAdapter
implements IAeProcessManager

Implements a simple in-memory process manager.
